name: MiaManageThings
0:
”Alexa turn on Demo Light”
”Alexa turn off Demo Light”
”Alexa open Living Room Shutter”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mia ManageThings Skill helps you control intelligently and easily your smart home using our dedicated Mia Hub device and the Mia Managethings App (available on the Apple App Store) which easily integrates with most manufacturers smart devices using z-wave, zigbee, wi-fi and other popular smart networking technologies. 
For more information please visit our website at www.managethings.com or email us at info@managethings.com
